candidates.text: . . . and so @{{user.displayName}} folds into the night, unseen, yes, but still very present . . .
It is ok @{{user.displayName}} , no interactions are needed. Feel secure in your lurk, you are wanted here.
And forsooth! @{{user.displayName}}  didst Lurk, and it was good, and all quietly smiled in their hearts.
Some say Transcendental Lurking is a myth, a fantasy made of vapors! @{{user.displayName}} , in one majestic swoop, you have proven them all wrong.
There are rumors, or maybe rumors of rumors, that @{{user.displayName}}  is lurking in these chat hallways . . .
@{{user.displayName}} stepped into the quantum leap accelerator . . . and vanished. Enjoy your lurk.
